page.title: 12EDUCATION IN BOWER
page.content: There were five primary schools in the parish in 1952, but the numbers attending those schools was small compared to 1901: School Roll in 1951 1901 No of Teachers Stemster 15 60 1 Gillock 10 40 1 Bower 26 90 2 Stanstill 11 50 1 Barrock 31 80 2 1985 Bower: 34 In Mr Steven's survey of 1952, he found that there were no Higher Grade centres in the parish and most pupils over 12 years proceeded to Castletown Junior Secondary, Wick Senior Secondary and Thurso Senior. P7 pupils in 1985 transfer to Wick and Thurso High Schools.
